channel.title: Docs on l8nite
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on l8nite

item.title: The Magic Plane
item.description: Visual Description # The magical planes are a constantly evolving space which adapts based on the physical space around them. As constant change occurs in the physical plane, the magic plane is forced to adapt around it.

item.title: Khari
item.description: Stat Block # Hardiness Strength Dexterity Acuity Charisma Arcana Intelligence Logic Starting 0 0 1 0 0 1 0 0 Limit 11 11 12 11 11 12 11 10 (Panthera Sapien Acutis) are the descendants of desert dwelling panthers of planet
